titles.title: National Academies of Practice Recognition Act of 2007
A bill to recognize the organization known as the National Academics of Practice.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. National Academies of Practice Recognition Act of 2007 - Grants a federal charter to the National Academies of Practice (a nonprofit corporation organized under the laws of the District of Columbia).
